amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 118-407 to direct the Securities and Exchange Commission to promulgate rules with respect to the electronic delivery of certain required disclosures to investors.
amendment.purpose: Amendment directs the Securities and Exchange Commission to promulgate rules with respect to the electronic delivery of certain required disclosures to investors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 269 - 153 (Roll no. 69).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 269 - 153 (Roll no. 69).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 269 - 153 (Roll no. 69).
